Package com.seamless.ers.interfaces.external.data

Class Summary
Amount This is the standard class used to send amounts to/from the ERS.
ClientContext Context is used to authenticate and authorize a specific client request but also to provide other request parameters.
CustomerToken Loyalty program identifies a discount
Invoice A document issued by a seller to initiate a payment process.
MapAdapter Custom marshaler for Maps.
MapArray Transport object for Maps in JAXB
MapArray.Parameter  
ParameterMap A wrapper for a map.
PaymentInvoiceRow Deprecated. This class is only used in Invoice but has been superseded by ERSWSExternalClientService.submitPaymentReceipt(ClientContext, String, ReceiptDocument) .
Principal A principal is an entity in the ERS, and is either a reseller or a subscriber.
PrincipalAccount An account that belongs to a principal.
PrincipalAccountSpecifier An account specifier uniquely identifies an account of a principal.
PrincipalId A unique identifier for a principal.
PrincipalPurchaseProductSpecifier  
PurchaseOrderRow  
Receipt Holds a receipt for a payment in Mobile Payment process
ReceiptDocument Receipt document for a payment
Report A class that represents a report generated by the ERS.
Terminal A terminal is a device, i.e.
 

Enum Summary
